record.title: ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, MAY 12, 2008
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, MAY 12, 2008 -- (House of Representatives - May 08, 2008)

[Page: H3311]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet at 2 p.m. on Monday next, and further, that when the House adjourns on that day, it adjourn to meet at 12:30 p.m. on Tuesday, May 13, for morning-hour debate.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Maryland?
